thread.title: Aly Raisman Shows Off Rockin' Bod For Sports Illustrated Swimsuit
thread.title_full: Aly Raisman Shows Off Rockin' Bod For Sports Illustrated Swimsuit

author: Joel Balsam
title: Aly Raisman Shows Off Rockin' Bod For Sports Illustrated Swimsuit
text:
Olympian Aly Raisman Does Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Photoshoot © Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Olympian Aly Raisman Does Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Photoshoot Trending News: Aly Raisman Shows Off Rockin' Bod For Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Shares Quick Take 
Remember Aly Raisman from the 2012 Olympics? Now scrub that image from your mind and throw it in the fire cause the Olympian is all grown up and...wow. 
Sports Illustrated Swimsuit appears to have a crush on the six-time gold medal winning gymnast, showcasing her for the second time since the New Year — and we can't blame them. Raisman's January Sports Illustrated video was with fellow gymnast Simone Biles, but this time she's all on her own. 
Take a peak and try and stay on your chair without falling off the side. Then, go to take a cold shower. If you're not near a shower, run home. 
The behind-the-scenes footage showcases Aly's rockin' bod, bulging muscles and...side boob (lots of side boob) with the tagline "Strong is Really Beautiful." Indeed, Aly is a specimen of elite fitness with a set of abs you could easily wash clothes on. 
And if you still feel weird about watching her because you recall 2012, don't. She's 22-years-old and very much a woman (who could very much kick your ass). 
Want more? Check out these topless pics of Aly, which are also from the SI shoot. Drop This Fact 
Raisman is the first ever American gymnast to win an Olympic medal in the floor exercise competition twice in a row. Show comments
